Container.Name: nadekobot
Container.Overview:
Nadekobot is a Discord bot with an extensive set of available commands and moderation tools for your own Discord guild. You can view the available commands on https://nadeko.bot/commands
Official project repository: https://gitlab.com/Kwoth/nadekobot

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: This is the Discord Bot token taken from App -> Bot -> TOKEN on the developers page

Config.Name: Discord Owner ID
Config.Description: Runs once and only when no configuration is found; comma seperated eg 123123,321321

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: This folder contains the bot configs and sqlite database.
